org.springframework.data.keyvalue.core

接口 CriteriaAccessor<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - 

    public interface CriteriaAccessor<T>
    Resolves the criteria object from given KeyValueQuery.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      T resolve(KeyValueQuery<?> query)
      Checks and reads KeyValueQuery.getCriteria() of given KeyValueQuery.

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolve

        @Nullable
T resolve(KeyValueQuery<?> query)
        Checks and reads KeyValueQuery.getCriteria() of given KeyValueQuery. Might also apply additional transformation to match the desired type.
        参数:
        query - must not be null.
        返回:
        the criteria extracted from the query. Can be null.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case the criteria is not valid for usage with specific CriteriaAccessor.
